description:
Located just blocks from Fenway Park & minutes from Back Bay, this modern building is the perfect choice. You’ll find all the essentials for a comfortable & convenient Boston getaway, including a full line-up of great amenities:
●Spacious floor plans & floor-to-ceiling windows
●State-of-the-art gym offering panoramic city views
●Walkable neighborhood with shops, restaurants, and easy access to transit
Servicing Boston hospital patients including Boston Children’s Hospital.

The space
Whether you’re a diehard Red Sox fan or couldn’t care less about sports, you’ll find this contemporary building and the charming neighborhood surrounding Fenway Park to be real winners.
